Class ObservableTarget

Namespace
Vts.Common.Logging
Assembly
Vts.dll

Writes log messages to an ArrayList in memory for programmatic retrieval.

[Target("Observable")]
public sealed class ObservableTarget : TargetWithLayout, IDisposable, IObservable<string>

Remarks

The default value of the layout is: 

\({longdate}|\){level:uppercase=true}|\({logger}|\){message}
